com.mobius.vdrapi
Class TopicVersionNode

java.lang.Object
  |

              |
              +--com.mobius.vdrapi.TopicVersionNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasConnectionState, IListFactory, INode, IVersion
public class TopicVersionNode
extends VersionNode

A TopicVersionNode object is created by a Topic object, and represents a version of a topic located on a specified document server. A version contains a list of sections and data describing the topic version.

Method Summary
 INode[] createList(QueryParam queryParam)
          Creates a list of either TopicItemNode items or TopicItemEntryNode items, based upon the specified query parameters.
 String getReturnedVersion()
          Returns a String containing the version ID that was passed back by the server after the topic was opened.

Method Detail

createList

public INode[] createList(QueryParam queryParam)
                   throws ViewDirectException
Creates a list of either TopicItemNode items or TopicItemEntryNode items, based upon the specified query parameters. If these parameters are provided by an instance of QueryParam, this method returns an array of TopicItemNode items. If these parameters are provided by an instance of TopicItemEntryQueryParam, this method returns an array of TopicItemEntryNode items.

Specified by:
createList in interface IListFactory
Specified by:
createList in class VersionNode
Parameters:
queryParam - object used to specify the query parameters. Specify either a QueryParam object, or a TopicItemEntryQueryParam object, depending on the type of topic item list you want to retrieve.
Throws:
DataNotFoundException - thrown if the results set is empty.
ViewDirectException - thrown if an error occurs while generating the list of INode objects.

getReturnedVersion

public String getReturnedVersion()
                          throws ViewDirectException
Returns a String containing the version ID that was passed back by the server after the topic was opened.

ViewDirectException
